content.detailedDescription:
This event took place on november 18 , 20014 at about 4:25 pm location
at a roof top of a two story building located in brooklyn ny bushwick section
address 428-432 troutman street it was a clear afternoon sunny day my
wife was taking photos of manhattan skyline using her i phone 6 she took her
first photo looking at how it came out she noticed a very bright yellow circle 
above the sun at first she didn't  notice anything strange about it then she 
mentioned to her sister that was close bye showed the photo  and made a
comment how strange and odd about the bright light in the sky then my
wife took more pictures then shot  some videos , there is a dark object
moving it is an airplane laguardia airport is nearby and also when you
hear a loud buzzing sound in the video is not from the object in the
sky but is from an electric wood saw there are construction going out
on this property when i got home from work in the evening my wife
showed me the photos and video i was very convinced that is
ufo of unknown origin
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My wife was taking photos with her i phone 6 from the roof top of the address listed she looked at the photo and noticed a bright yellow circle dot in the sky and noticed moving  around she took more pictures and set up movie mode

content.detailedDescription:
While returning home on fox island (to s.E. end of island) son and friend of son witness two hovering objects as, what was described as hovering just above tree tops. two crafts were observed and assumed to be same size even though one craft in the background above and behind the closest craft appeared to be smaller due to positioning. 

craft took up entire windshield of honda crv since it was that close and that large and estimated to be just above 80 foot douglas fir trees when observed. 

craft had the appearance to be triangle in shape but son said had wings and central bubble cockpit which was glowing assumed from internal lighting ? on each wing tip son said there were three bright white lights. when son looked at friend to discuss what was being seen, when looking back in a couple of seconds object was gone. objects were not seen again. 

twenty min later wife arrived home and said she had seen same object further west and over marsh when traveling south towards fox island. again object was seen above t intersection but this time much closer to surface, just above the marsh. wife continued down the hill some mile from her first observation and saw what she assumed to be the same craft out over the bay (water) between the mainland and fox island as she was crossing the bridge to fox island. having heard from son there were two craft what my could have observed was the second craft. weird !
content.summary: Two objects hovering fifty feet over trees straight ahead e of t intersection while i was traveling east.

content.detailedDescription: While outside stargazing, we witnessed 3 white lights which formed a triangle shape and flew overhead. it appeared to have other colorful lights or strobes pulsating around its perimeter. it was slow and soundless.
content.summary: 3 white lights formed a triangle shape and flew overhead. it appeared to have other colorful lights or strobes pulsating around its perimeter

content.detailedDescription: On october 29,2014 at approximately 04:00 hrs. i stepped out onto my patio at my home residence and seeing a clear crisp sky, i went inside my apartment and retrieved my binoculars (celestron 10x50 field) and started to observe the night sky that was very clear and calm. i was observing the orion constellation for a few minutes in the s.E. section of the sky. after a slight strain on my neck i then put down the binoculars and continued to observe orion without the binoculars when i noticed to the left side of orion's belt a star that seemed to be in the middle of a triangle shape object. the triangle was narrow but i could see the star right though it. the lines of the triangle seemed solid but had a bluish tint to it. i observed no running lights on it nor any landing like lights. i could not detect any sound and figured this object was approx. 3-5 thousand feet or more in the sky . this object remained stationary in the sky over the star for over a minute. thinking it could have been my eyes i quickly looked at other stars in the vicinity but did not see any shape around them. i then looked back at the star in question and still could see the triangle shape object in the same spot. it was then i remembered my binoculars, turned to pick them up from a small table on my patio and when i trained them on the star, the triangular shaped object was gone. i have no video or pictures of the object in question. nor did i report this to any authorities thinking it would have been quickly dismissed anyway. i did discuss it with a co-member of my astronomy club who suggested i report it to mufon.
content.summary: Sited triaglular outline object stationary in sky left side of orion constellation' belt

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a cruise ship in the western caribbean and had sailed around the southern tip of cuba earlier that day from east to west.  before the sun set that evening i noticed that we were no longer within sight of land.  late that night, probably 1am or later i went out on to the balcony.  there were stars in the sky but, it was a dark night and i couldn't tell where the ocean and sky met.  all of the sudden i observed a very bright, very, very large light on the horizon off of the bow of the ship on the starboard side.  the light was not close but off on the horizon.  if flashed like an explosion and was huge lighting up most of the horizon.  it brightened up for a few seconds and then dimmed down for a few seconds.  the whole event was about ten seconds.  there was no sound whatsoever that i could hear.  the light was totally orange and seemed to disappear under the water, although that could have been an optical illusion.  

i went back into the cabin and turned on the tv to see what our location was.  the television in our cabin indicated that we were over a deep ocean trench on our way to grand cayman.  if there were other witnesses i wouldn't know about it although i suspect that the crew on the navigation deck probably saw it as it was in front of the ship.   

i cannot be certain of the hour.  i was sleeping and woke up and wanted to go outside on the balcony for a while.  i didn't take a watch and had no way to see what time it was.  

earlier in the evening, as the sun went down i was sitting on the balcony watching the sun set and a passenger jet at high altitude go by.  i observed a very fast aircraft go by at high altitude.  it seemed to me to be a conventional aircraft as it flew in a straight line but, the speed was astounding compared to the passenger jet that was also in the sky.  i have no reason to assume that it had anything to do with the aforementioned event involving the bright light on the horizon.
content.summary: Huge light over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: Well at our mira loma house in .Ca. riverside county i witnessed and recorded the huge orb from my second story room window and the first night recorded it for almost forty minutes it moved realnalow and i have a plane going by in the shot who's is perfect for showing howng how fast it was going . then the next night it was back and i recored for thirty plus minutes. then again the third night it came back and i recorded it for another forty minutes or so. it dod the same thing every night amazing unworldy glow and lights what a spectacle. especially when i zoom. the my fourth video is me and my wife out side on our porch still light starting to get dark a little. i saw a bright star and my wife saw a black dot over it which undid not notice at first. but then when i saw it i knew i had to dash inside upstairs and back down and outside with our video camera. but it's all on my memory card which is not compatible with my phone. you guys can gave the memory card to check and authenticate it, it is legitimate. or i can re-record them from my computer to my video camera on my phone . but it won't be good quality probably but please respond and let me know what you would like me to do . i could record them and send then to you. or unfounded mail the memory card or what or what should i do.
content.summary: I have 4 seperate videos. three of a huge orb phlsating and flashing for almost two hours. amd a thanksgiving ufo sighting me and my wife saw it at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: We took a break from watching  a movie on tv. my husband looked out our window and saw some lights which  were strange. we went out our front porch and watched these  4 balls of lights spin around clockwise then meet into the middle as one then back out again repeating the cycle.   we watched for 5 minutes then suddenly poof..They were gone. they were over the river and quite large. i had phoned my aunt.She was about 5 minutes away from us. she looked out and could see the circle of lights.  i found it weird,errie ,strange but very beautiful at the same time.  i initially thought of northern lights but soon realized that it was not. they were stationary rotating in the one spot into the middle and out again.
content.summary: My husband and  i observed  4 balls of light rotating clockwise..Meet in middle back out again repeating.

content.detailedDescription: Well at our mira loma house in .Ca. riverside county i witnessed and recorded the huge orb from my second story room window and the first night recorded it for almost forty minutes it moved realnalow and i have a plane going by in the shot who's is perfect for showing howng how fast it was going . then the next night it was back and i recored for thirty plus minutes. then again the third night it came back and i recorded it for another forty minutes or so. it dod the same thing every night amazing unworldy glow and lights what a spectacle. especially when i zoom. the my fourth video is me and my wife out side on our porch still light starting to get dark a little. i saw a bright star and my wife saw a black dot over it which undid not notice at first. but then when i saw it i knew i had to dash inside upstairs and back down and outside with our video camera. but it's all on my memory card which is not compatible with my phone. you guys can gave the memory card to check and authenticate it, it is legitimate. or i can re-record them from my computer to my video camera on my phone . but it won't be good quality probably but please respond and let me know what you would like me to do . i could record them and send then to you. or unfounded mail the memory card or what or what should i do.
content.summary: I have 4 seperate videos. three of a huge orb phlsating and flashing for almost two hours. amd a thanksgiving ufo sighting me and my wife saw it at the same time.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to the mail box at around 6:30pm and i looked up and saw a red trail like a meteor for 5 sec, however unlikely a meteor that keep getting brighter and brighter, this one kept always its red brightness constant and out of the blue it went up! at a very high speed and disappeared. it was really strange. red trail, red light and bam, up it went very fast.
content.summary: It was like a meteor but suddenly it went up! brightness kept the same

content.detailedDescription:
In 2012 i was living in merida, yucatan, occurs as the same time of year in november when i was washing my car at night, get off of my big hurry department has cleaned the windows when suddenly i see what happens kind of skinny ghost and high behind me, take a few steps back when i see the cat my neighbor with huge eyes, dilated pupils and towards an ugly sound, and the cat was looking at me like something was behind me (it was so) climbed quickly to the department i told my mom she immediately under me where he washed the car to see what i get scared and told me not to worry, that day i could not sleep but the way of what i saw was tall skinny it was a color like the color of translucent white but transparent plastic at a time; this happened to me a while back but now i live in chetumal, quintanaroo and have 5 days to raise an awful dream i made was so clear that it looked like a memory, that memory i was at my sister's game in which i attended in june this year and at some point that ended the game i stared the sky a ship floating on top of the dome and the nave was pulling as if they would control gravity light cables as if they were elastic suspenders and when pulling only saw lightning blinding and then i get up around 4 am and see two of them i saw two of them in my room, one high and one smaller with the same characteristics of the first one i saw a few years ago and gave me a sleep paralysis for the scare he gave me, i woke up i turned on the lights and went back to sleep an hour later, (by the way the first time i had a paralysis of sleep was in june when i get to work at 4 in the afternoon directly to take a nap was when i got only managed to open one eye and saw a huge black shadow as if you were hooded at the foot of my bed and there experience the worst paralysis sleep, catch its breath for seconds for me was an eternity.) after that day i have five days of no sleep and two days ago on the morning i took a photo with my dog on my phone and back in the reflection of the glass in my door you can see the face of the little creature.
the only thing i want is to know what you want from me! i'm being crazy, no one believes this.
content.summary: I was abduced ,i know cuz i saw it in my room,i don't know what that want

content.detailedDescription: It took of behind trees and flew in all different directions kept turning going up and down and it had two lights then three then four then five then six. it then shot a blue light out of the side at very high speed which was then observed flying east very high up in the sky.  then the big craft started to come toward me and i ran into my house to report it
content.summary: Flew everywhere

content.detailedDescription: At 1:30am i came out the house to the backyard to have a cigarette. it was a clear and beautiful night. the stars were out, and i started star gazing. when all of the sudden i saw a light formation in the shape of a triangle fly from north to south. the craft/lights made no sound whatsoever, after 25 seconds or so, the craft disappeared. there were no planes, or helicopters in the area. managua, nicaragua, where i'm located, has very limited flight traffic after 10pm. the only plane that lands after midnight is a spirit airlines flight that comes form ft. lauderdale, fl. and i'm very far from the airport. therefore, it could not have been the airplane landing.
content.summary: Saw lights/craft on a shape of a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about mid-august 1949 around 10 pm. i and another boy (both 12) were abducted/taken up into a oval opening by a white beam that turned blue. i cannot speak for the other boy/man but he is still alive and afterwards had a stellar career in computers while working in the manufacturing of paper industry.

myself, i was employed in the military and intelligence fields.

while in the craft i was subjected to an examination of both my physical body and mind. i am able to remember a large amount of what occurred while we were in their custody; but, i will only expound upon this and one other sighting/experience i had while working in france, in 1960. those two experiences as well as my past, background  and qualifications will only be told to someone within the mufon investigative community familiar with classified information since some of the information occurred while i was in the military and could still be classified. also, i am more than willing to attest/swearing an oath to all events having happened as well as supply documentation of what many of the later consequences were.
content.summary: Could not see entire craft only oval opening otherwise mist/cloud appearance

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my business in little river, sc last night.  i saw multiple lights above the tree line that "turned on" in succession, and then went out in the same manner.

since these were very similar to what my wife had seen over our house in longs, sc, a few months ago,  i called her and told her.

after the phone call,  the lights reappeared and again disappeared at a slightly different place over the trees.

i texted her that i had seen it again.  when she received the text,  it made her want to go outside and look at the sky. 

as she was walking through the back door, she heard a neighbor yell "holy cow! do you see that?" in the sky she saw a multiple orbs that instantaneously move from one side of the horizon to the other.  keep in mind that this happened 10 miles away from my location where i was almost at the exact same moment seeing what i saw.

the craft then moved to a very high altitude, directly over our house. at this point scared, my wife went inside and just asked me to come home.
content.summary: Multiple sites, multiple ufos

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of november 19, 2014, my four-year-old daughter and i were returning home from church (which is located in marquette, mi).  we reside in a location called arnold, michigan; which is located approximately 40 miles south of marquette.  the highway we were traveling to reach arnold, is known as county road 557.

it was roughly 16 miles down this road (heading south), that she and i both spotted a very bright light in the sky, located to the right of the vehicle.  initially i thought it could be a spotlight shining up from a local camp we were nearing, but upon passing the camp i realized it was far too bright for a spotlight to make that kind of illumination.

we rounded a corner and lost sight of the light for a few seconds, it then appeared to the left of the vehicle further ahead; approximately 50-100 feet above the treeline.  i pulled the vehicle over when there was a break in the trees, and it could be spotted more easily.  after observing the light for about 20 seconds, i felt rather assured that it was not moving, but rather hovering over the trees (note, there are no residences, camps, or buildings of any type in the area this was spotted; only dense forest).  i put down my driver side window all of the way, sticking my head out to listen for any type sound that my be emitted from this object; but it was silent.  i also noted there were very random flashings of smaller (much smaller) lights flashing around the lower portion of where the main bright light was located.  these were red, orange, and green in color.  the bright light we initially spotted however, remained steady.  

approximately 10 more seconds into this visual and auditory observation (my head still out of the window), the object suddenly and very rapidly darted to the north (the direction we had just been traveling from). the speed at which i will not try to estimate, but it was not fast enough that my eye could not be kept on it.  but i can say with certainty it appeared to be faster than what a plane would travel.  (we do have an airport, sawyer international, which is located in the town of gwinn...Planes do not typically come in from this direction to land however).

at this juncture, i had not said much aloud.  although i was feeling rattled and a bit unsure of what we were witnessing, i did not want my daughter to be scared. i do remember saying, "what is that?"  "it looks like it's not moving." she must have sensed my unease though, because she asked in a shaky tone if we "could go now".  i put up the window, told her it was probably an airplane, and continued down the road.  there was no sight of the object in the rear view mirror from what i could see.

my adrenaline was pumping; i do not discount anything being possible in this universe, but personally (until that moment at least), i had not subscribed to the belief in ufo's.  the next thing that happened has shifted my thinking.

we traveled on, my daughter in the back saying we had to tell papa (that would be my father), about the bright light in the sky.  i was in the front saying a prayer for god to calm my nerves!  we were approximately 3 to 4 miles down the road from where we had pulled over, when again, the bright light was up ahead to our left.  this particular part of the highway is a stretch about 1/2 mile long; i could catch sight of the illumination every now and then through the trees as we neared it.  as we came closer, i did not stop this time, but did slow down to look.  as before, it hovered about 50-100 feet above the treeline to the left of the vehicle; the bright light was still radiant and constant, with the other (smaller) lights flashing at random intervals.  as we passed it (going maybe 25 mph) it was clear this object was 1) not an airplane 2) stationary 3) a replica of what we had just seen and/or 4) possibly the same object we had witnessed.  passing by, the object did not dart away, or move in any fashion as it had last time. we traveled the reamining seven miles home without any further sightings. 

this second sighting a few miles down the road, really cemented the experience.  later that evening, after my daugher was asleep, i hit the internet to find more information about ufo sightings in michigan's upper penninsula.  it was astounding to see how many people have documented situations and descriptions similar to my own. there was some hesitation with sharing this sighting, but after giving it some thought, i realized that it is prior testimonies that are helping me digest what it is we saw that evening; and maybe this story can help another come forward.
content.summary: Spotted in area known for dense forest; one rather bright light with occassional flashes of smaller lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was just getting out of the pool on a sunny afternoon; as i was watching some storm clouds forming in the eastern sky, i saw a white, star-like object come out of the east (above the clouds). it was circular or orb-like and it was not glowing or glinting in the sun. as i watched, the object abruptly stopped in the air and hovered for a few moments. it then took a sharp, 90 degree turn towards my right (south) before it stopped again. it then took another sharp turn and headed back towards the east (stopped again). once more, it turned sharply and drifted to the north (my left). this time it held this position for several minutes. the clouds were drifting towards the south, south west, but the object was not apparently impacted by the force of the winds (ground level winds 6mph). after a few more minutes time, a second similar-looking object came out of the west and headed east (flew directly over me). this one seemed smaller and possibly had a cyan-colored light on it (it was difficult to discern...It seemed blurred/fuzzy for some reason). this object must have been travelling diagonally upwards because it started below the cloud level and gradually disappeared into the cloud. after the second object disappeared, the first object moved remarkably rapidly (diagonally downward, about a 50 degree angle) towards the second object. they (presumably) met together in the cloud. i did not see the objects depart nor have i seen them since.
had the objects been on the ground, i estimate they would have been rather large, possibly the size of a mid-size plane considering how well i could see them from the ground. the first object was only moving in a certain quadrant of the sky and i'm not sure if i can accurately gauge the speed at which it was travelling between stops. from the ground, it appeared to move at a similar rate of speed an airplane does. if it helps to determine the height of the storm cloud (which the object hovered over), the temperature was 101 degrees f, dew point 59 degrees f, cumulus with an anvil top.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 daytime objects hovering, changing direction before disappearing behind cloud

content.detailedDescription: Two different types of beings contacting me. one is a gray and the other is pure energy.Have pictures of them.They contact me directly in my mind with thought and video type transmitions.I need to talk to someone to deal with this ,any help would be apperciated.My dentist says i have an implant of unknown origin in my bottom left jaw.I also have an alien orb behind me in a photo when i was 5yrs old playing a piano.I have been on board their ship several times.My body stays behind, but im there as energy.Hard to explain.Have a scorched landing site 75 ft from my house where we enter and take off.I saw alot! need to share infro with someone who can understand.
content.summary: They are contacting me almost ever day.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend, outside of his house in dickson city, about 9:30-9:45pm, saw an object in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane, but it hovered for approximately 10 minutes. so then i thought it could be a helicopter, but saw no apparent shape. it flashed red, blue and white lights, similar to a police helicopter, but the flashing of the lights were not in police light fashion, the patterns looked to be random. at one point, the lights seemed to go around the object in a circular/disc-like shape. there also looked to be another object, that illuminated no light, nor reflected any light from the object, fly right by it at high speeds. because of light pollution it was very hard to see, and was much smaller than the object. the object also looked to of moved closer to us, slowly, then further away. peaking our curiosity, we jumped in my car to drive closer to it. walking to my car we briefly lost sight of it. we got in my car and started driving up the street, when we noticed it was at a new location, drastically north of it's previous location, leaving us to believe it traveled very fast (from when we lost sight to regaining sight of the object only took about 20 seconds). we drove toward it, keeping our eye on it, while noticing it looking to ascend and descend. knowing we'll have no luck getting closer, and video or pictures would not be captured well due to light pollution, i took my friend back home. as i was driving away i could no longer see it, but he contacted me minutes later and said it was back in it's original spot, just hovering there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw object in hover in sky, strange light patterns, fast movement then hovered again.

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:55 pm on 11/19/14 i was driving on interstate i459 going towards hoover.
right after i passed the morgan rd exit i look up into the sky.

i see what looks like a small two seat airplane. i say that because it was low(tree tops) and was moving across the sky going to my right it was not going to fast. the bessemer airport is about 5-10 miles from where i was. anyway all of a sudden this object turns upside down and goes back to the left. it stops and hovers?? i was thinking that sure don't act or seem like a small airplane? as i get close i see its a black triangle craft hovering right over a bridge along i459. i could not believe it!! someone else had to see it. the interstate was busy, so far no reports were on the news. as i drove up i459 and went under the overpass/bridge i was right under this thing. like i said it was a dark triangle craft hovering. it had 3-4 lights on each side. they were white, bright like a big flood light. they were blinking on and off. one side the lights would blink 1,2,3,4. then go dark, then the other side would blink 1,2,3,4. i tired to slow down and get a pic but traffic would not allow it. i saw this thing for about 30 sec-1 min once i was under it. it was very very low, tree top height. what is also strange is about 10 mins before i saw this craft my aunt said something flew over her house and made a strange noise. she lives west of where i was. maybe about 5-10 mins away. she said something was in the air coming over her house and made a strange noise. she did not see it, but heard something. odd for sure.
the killing part is about 2 months ago i saw something strange in the sky not far from where i saw this. i could not make out this object because it looked like a plane in the far distance the appeared then disappeared????
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
1. in back yard of my house.
2. the actual color of the ufo and random maneuvers it was making.
3. one of those remote control helicopters.
4. it to be interested in this area. it would go side to side then up and down there was a bunch of planes around it.
5. nervous, excited
6. i lost sight of the object twice both times when it would descend so low that i could not see .
content.summary: My family and i were outside about to bbq when noticed and extremely bright blue light moving up and down side to side and circling this one area with sudden movements

content.detailedDescription: I am outside with my friends and first i only saw an object like star/sphere really bright orange colored. we first think that was an airplane but airplane is not like that and than we think that was satelite but satelite is really high this was a really huge starlike/sphere. first object moved down and than goes up and than it just goes forward and disappeared after 1 min i dont know what is that :/
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: Took photos of scenery. ...Caught orb by accident.
content.summary: took photos of scenery. ..Caught orb by accident

content.detailedDescription: On the 18th of november 2014 at around 22:30 i was returning home from walking my dog when i noticed a small light moving across the sky in the south west. i initially thought this light was a satellite due to the linear movement and speed that it was travelling. the light seemed to be about the same size as a star and i couldn't tell how far away it was. after almost a minute the light stopped and stayed perfectly still. i tried to take a photo of it but it was too far away. i continued walking and kept looking back at the light to see whether it had moved. a few minutes later, once i had got home, i saw the light split into three seperate lights and again stay perfectly still and forming the points of a triangle. i have lived in measham for a number of years and, although we regularly get flight traffic due to nearby east midlands airport, i have never seen anything like this. i called my wife outside and pointed out what i was seeing. she tried to capture the lights on video but they were too small to see. after a few more minutes the lights shot off across the sky at incredible speed in different directions. they travelled in a perfectly straight line and had vanished beneath the horizon in about three seconds.
content.summary: Three bright lights (star-like)

content.detailedDescription: Saw this thing coming my way at a slow speed and  it was weird because no sound or lights and i know it wasn't any plane that i'm familiar with ! it slowly veered east towards downtown edmonton and i lost sight of it due to the sky over downtown is light up and this thing seemed transparent and hard to see clearly !
content.summary: Saw object floating south towards me at about 500ft making no sound or lights and seemed transparent then it went south east and i lost sight of it in the city lights

content.detailedDescription:
1 friends at riverbed enjoying some nature.
2 extremely bright star that descended behind some trees.
3 thought it was a supernova as was so bright.It's descent was startling so friend grabbed their phone from nearby car to record. 
4 not sure of the exact shape as was obscured by what seemed to be orbiting lights around a structure. approximate disc shaped. made a wind rushing whirring hum noise.
5 scared to be out in the open, went and sat in nearby car , felt safer.
6 it turned out of view.
content.summary: Dark object with orbiting flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: On 29 october 2014, my wife and i were driving home from the north georgia mountains. at about 5:25 pm, we saw strange clouds forming over highway 575 south of jasper. at that time i remembered reading about ufos using clouds to hide or recharge their systems so, on a whim, i took three photos but forgot to look at them until now. it is important to note that we could not see the object in real time when the event actually occurred. it was only today, three weeks later, that i saw what appears to be a huge ufo, 800 to 1000 yards across, entering and hovering in the clouds. i took the pictures with my cell phone from the passenger seat of our car. the pictures are in sequence, taken several seconds apart. fyi, i am a retired air force officer and pilot who has flown all over the world, with a phd in business from a highly respected school.
content.summary: On highway 575 south of jasper, saw strange-looking clouds. took pictures, but did not see huge ufo till later in pictures entering clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Woke up about 1am. looked out east window and thought i was looking at a very bright moon through thin clouds.  
look out south window stars bright no clouds. laid back down and thought the moon looked strange but did not give it a second thought.  two days later saw crescent moon and  realized  that it was not the moon i saw two days before.
content.summary: Looked out east window thought i saw moon but very white. later realized no moon that night.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving north on bardstown rd in louisville, ky a little passed 7pm (cloudy night) november 18, 2014 about to get on i-265 e when i saw an odd bright white glowing triangular shaped light in the night sky ahead of us but a little towards the left.  it was a very well defined triangle shape pointed towards earth.  it was one fourth the size of the moon.  i wondered if it could be a fireball but it didn't seem to be moving much and the shape was a little odd being clearly triangular.  i couldn't watch it but for a few seconds when i had to look back at traffic to get on the freeway.  but this is not the primary object i am reporting on.

after we got on the freeway i couldn't turn my head enough to see the triangular light anymore.  but it got me looking skyward.  after a few minutes of driving on i-265 the highway turns northward - as it did we saw another object in the cloudy night sky directly in front of us.  this one was a bright white roundish to oval light with two much smaller lights on either side.  the big middle light did not blink.  the smaller ones did.  i'm not sure what color they were - mostly white-ish but there was some color to them.  the object appeared to be hovering.  what really shocked us about it was when a white oval-ish light dropped from below it.  i was driving and watching the road - so i can't say for 100% that it emanated from the brighter larger 3 light object but it was near enough that it probably did.  if descended straight down in front of us slower than any fireball or shooting star would have done.  it was not a shooting star even though i know there is a meteor shower going on.  it was a slower and larger moving object.  halfway down the light went off.  we couldn't observe it any longer as it was dark outside and cloudy as well.  the descending object was about 10 times the size of a shooting star.  and it didn't look like a meteor as it appeared to drop from the sky - not flying across and was slower than a meteor and there were clouds - not a clear sky behind it.  there was no sound associated with it and there were no little flashes of light as it descended.  the descending object was not "bright" like the 3 light object.  the descending object was a pale white light.  it did not resemble a fireball.  as it descended it's shape and brightness did not vary until the light just went out.  the 3 light object was about 15 times larger than the descending one.  the descending object really looked like it dropped down.

so yes it shocked me a little.  i didn't think to look at the time or where we were on the freeway.  we were probably near where taylorsville rd crosses the freeway.  as we drove down the freeway we passed under the larger 3 light object.  the time we were able to watch the 3 light object was about 1 minute.  the object that descended we watched for about 3 seconds and then the light went out when it was about halfway down.
content.summary: We saw an object in the nite sky that was very bright with one each smaller blinking light on either side.  we noticed a glowing orb drop down towards the ground from the vacinity of the larger object.  we lost sight of the descending object halfway down.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband picked myself and our 3 kids up from the austin airport after we came back from california.  our flight landed on 6/25/2013 at 10:50 or 10:55pm.  i had to drive us back so i was in the drivers seat.  my husband hurt his shoulder and couldn't drive back.  after we left the airport and turned onto highway 71 where there are stop lights along the highway, i believe we only drove about a mile on the 71 when we stopped at the light.  huge lights caught my eye out the window directly above our car.  i said to everybody, what's that up there, look!  i wanted to get out but my husband's shoulder was in too much pain (skateboarding injury the day before) and he was grouchy and wanted to go home.   all my kids looked up through the windows too and saw what i saw.  
it was huge, looked to be triangular shaped because of the location of the lights.  one at the point of the triangle and lights angled down on either side. it seems like there were either 5 or 7 lights that i saw, but not sure.  i do recall seeing to the left of me out the window and in front through the windshield and could only make out a triangle shape because of the location of the lights. i saw very large bright lights, round, but could not tell if if was a solid object hovering above.  i didn't have much time since we were at a stoplight.  it was massive in size and we did not hear any sounds of any kind. we did not have the windows rolled down though.  we had to drive off when the light turned green but i recall trying to keep looking through my window as i was driving but couldn't watch for more than a few seconds.  i do not know if it stayed there for a while or flew off.  i believe it was a ufo.  i was very excited about witnessing this.  i am a believer in et's. 

i wish i could talk to someone else that saw this too.  anyone out there that saw this that same night?

my kids remember this as well as i do.  it was awesome.  only wish i had gotten out and been able to take photos or just watch a while longer.
content.summary: Huge triangular shaped ufo just outside the austin airport sighted at a stop light overhead on the 71

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work looking to the western sky because the sun had set and the sky was cloudless. i had been looking at the sky all summer and fall for anything peculiar because of the prospect of sighting anything phenomenal due to seeing planes chem trailing in the morning and night, just on the horizon, as if they were trying to conceal something. then as if out of nowhere a huge pyramid out in space appeared. it had to be, i don't know, at least the size of probably a hundred miles in height and width. it was hard to tell because it was very far from the earth, possibly thousands of miles away but it was hard to tell because there was nothing to give it any kind of scale.
to me it looked planet like because i have never scene any flying object that size ever.The object appeared very very far away but still huge. i was stunned because it wasn't there,then it was there, then it was gone. i took two pictures of it before it disappeared. there were about 20 or so people around, but no one else saw or said anything so i said nothing. the whole experience happened so fast that i almost couldn't believe it. the thing is the pictures are from my phone so there crappy, so i'm hoping you will have the ability to make the photos better.
content.summary: Was watching the sky because it was just after sunset and the sky was clear and an object appeared out of nowhere
